description: These new unisex hike socks are designed with the performance athlete in mind. They offer our latest technologies, including our 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in fit and our patent-pending Indestructawool™ technology for amazing durability. For a higher level of comfort, these socks are designed with responsibly sourced Merino wool, which naturally helps with temperature regulation, odor control, and breathability, as well as additional body-mapped mesh zones, a Virtually Seamless™ toe, and a "stay put" fit. And best yet, they have the pride flag knit right into the design, so you can show your support of the LGBTQ+ community.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Pride Pattern Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 55% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 29% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane, 1% Polyester
